resources.string: Make sure that you have Node.js v8.15.1 and npm v5 or above installed. Clone this repo using git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/react-boilerplate/react-boilerplate.git <YOUR_PROJECT_NAME> Move to the appropriate directory: cd <YOUR_PROJECT_NAME>. Run npm run setup in order to install dependencies and clean the git repo. At this point you can run npm start to see the example app at http://localhost:3000. Run npm run clean to delete the example app.
